argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drhmsubcOLD.c | |- C = ( U i^i DivRing ) |
| 2 |  | drhmsubcOLD.j | |- J = ( r e. C , s e. C |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) |
| 3 |  | fldhmsubcOLD.d | |- D = ( U i^i Field ) |
| 4 |  | fldhmsubcOLD.f | |- F = ( r e. D , s e. D |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( r e. Field <-> ( r e. DivRing /\ r e. CRing ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( r e. CRing -> r e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( r e. DivRing /\ r e. CRing ) -> r e. Ring ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_sylbi | |- ( r e. Field -> r e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rgen | |- A. r e. Field r e. Ring |
| 10 | 9, 3, 4 | #P_sringcatOLD | |- ( U e. V -> ( ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |`cat F ) e. Cat ) |
